mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event(num, userId, userName, subject, content, hitCount, created, userIdx, start_date, end_date, imageFilename) VALUES (event_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, SYSDATE, #{userIdx}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{imageFilename})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM event e JOIN user1 u ON e.userId=u.userId
mapper.update: UPDATE event SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE num = #{num}
